verses.content: Hienghai hi David naupasalhai Hebrona pienghai chu an nih: nau lutîr Amnon, Jezreel mi Ahinoam inei, a pahnina, Daniel, Karmel mi Abigail inei;
a pathumna, Absalom, Gesur lal Talmai naunu Maaka naupa chu; a palina, Haggith naupa Adonija;
a pangana, Abital inei Sephatia; a parukna, a nuhmei Egla inei Ithream chu.
Hebrona chun paruk an piengpêk a; chun, chutaka ma chun kum sari le thla ruk sûng ro a rêl a, chun, Jeru- salema chun kum sâwmthum le kum thum a rêl a.
Chun, hienghai hi Jerusalema piengpêkhai chu an nih; Ammiel naunu Bathsua inei pali; Simea hai, Sobab hai, Nathan hai, Solomon hai hi;
chun, Ibhar hai, Elisama hai, Eliphelet hai;
Noga hai, Nepheg hai, Japhia hai;
chun, Elisama hai, Eliada hai, Eliphelet hai, an rêngin pakuo.
A thaikêmhai naupasalhai tiem loin hienghai po hi David naupasal- hai chu an na; an farnu chu Tamar a nih.
Chun, Solomon naupa chu Rehoboam a na, ama naupa chu Abija a na; ama naupa chu Asa a na, ama naupa chu Jehosaphat a na;
ama naupa chu Joram a na, ama naupa chu Ahazia a na; ama naupa chu Joas a na,
Ama naupa chu Amazia a na; ama naupa chu Azaria a na; ama naupa chu Jotham a na;
ama naupa chu Ahaz a na, ama naupa chu Hezekiah a na, ama naupa chu Manasse a na;
ama naupa chu Amon a na, ama naupa chu Josia a nih,
Chun, Josia naupasalhai chu, a upa tak chu Johanan a na, a pahnina chu Jehoiakim a na, a pathumna chu Zedekia a na, a palina chu Sallum a nih.
Chun, Jehoiakim naupasalhai chu Jekonia le Zedekia an nih.
Chun, Jekonia, suok intâng, naupasalhai chu: a naupa Sealtiel,
Malkiram, Pedaia, Senazar, Jekamia, Hosama le Nedabia an nih.
Chun, Pedaia naupasalhai chu: Zerubbabel le Simei; chun, Zerub- babel naupasalhai chu: Mesullam le Hanania an na, an farnu chu Selomith a nih;
chun, Hasuba, Ohel, Berekia, Hasadia le Jusab-hesed, panga an nih.
Chun, Hanania naupasalhai chu: Pelatia le Jesaia: Rephaia naupasal- hai, Arnan naupasalhai, Obadia nau- pasalhai, Sekania naupasalhai hi.
Chun, Sekania naupasalhai chu: Semaia, chun, Semaia naupasal- hai chu: Hattus, Igal, Baria, Nearia le Saphat, paruk an nih.
Chun, Nearia naupasalhai chu Elioenai, Hizkia le Azrikam, pathum an nih.
Chun, Elioenai naupasalhai chu Hodavia, Eliasib, Pelaia, Akkub, Johanan, Delaia le Anani, pasari an nih.
